p: (6) The Duplication of Moieties. Synthetic lipid-like compound 26 was obtained as a “dimeric” form of compound 10, which was proposed as a promising DNA delivery agent. Cytotoxicity data of amphiphiles (comp. 26 versus comp. 10) demonstrated that this structural modification slightly decreased cytotoxicity of the target compound 26 in both tested cancer HT-1080 and MH-22A cells (12–27 μg/ml versus 3–6 μg/ml, respectively) and also considerably decreased the LD 50 value—5164 mg/kg versus 1482 mg/kg.
